name: Deles
description:
Deles is a 2D game with a huge universe with millions of stars and planets. It is in Alpha phase and will be actively developed.

Features:

- Huge procedurally generated map

- Realistic temperature and orbit calculations

- Simple view from the planet's surface

- Simple planet types ( there will be more of them)

- Density of the galaxy (the closer to the center of the galaxy, the more stars)

Controls:

- Left-click on a star to fly there

- Middle mouse button to scroll through larger planetary systems
